heading: Service101 — Automotive Workshop SaaS
description: Developed core frontend features for an automotive workshop management SaaS platform.
Contributed to migration from monolithic architecture to microservices.
Implemented SEO optimization using Server-Side Rendering (SSR) in Next.js.
Collaborated with global teams in agile sprints and translated Figma designs into scalable UI.

heading: LexHost — AI Powered Legal Insights Platform
description: Built dynamic UI components and role-based access systems.
Designed structured database workflows using Supabase.
Improved platform usability through optimized expert insights UI.
Worked in a collaborative international product environment.

heading: Translate-a-Bill — AI Contract Translator
description: Implemented multilingual localization using i18next.
Improved accessibility of legal and billing documents with optimized UX.
Built scalable frontend workflows integrated with Supabase backend.
Collaborated with international stakeholders during product delivery.

heading: Worzo Electric Scooters — E-commerce & Admin Dashboard
description: Built an e-commerce platform with secure admin dashboard for product management.
Implemented authentication and CMS features for real-time website content control.
Developed scalable backend APIs using MERN stack.
Improved operational workflow through centralized admin controls.

heading: Ved Tour & Travels — Travel Listing Platform
description: Developed travel listing platform with admin panel for trip and blog management.
Created workflows for package creation, gallery uploads, and content publishing.
Improved responsiveness and UI performance using React and Tailwind CSS.
Enabled easy content management through custom dashboard features.

heading: AI Email Automation System
description: Developed AI-powered email automation using Cohere AI and Google OAuth2.
Implemented background job processing using BullMQ and Redis.
Built context-aware automated replies reducing manual workflow effort.
Designed scalable REST APIs for asynchronous email processing.

heading: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Built scalable real-time chat system supporting private and group messaging.
Implemented typing indicators and instant delivery using Socket.io.
Optimized database operations for real-time performance.
Designed responsive UI using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
